text: Alberto Arturo Miguel Bachelet Martínez (; 27 April 1923 – 13 March 1974) was a Chilean Brigadier General of the Chilean Air Force. He was against the 1973 coup of General Augusto Pinochet, and was imprisoned and tortured for several months until his death in 1974 of a heart attack while in prison. His daughter Michelle Bachelet has been twice elected President of Chile. ==References== Category:1974 deaths Category:1923 births Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Chilean generals
title: Alberto Bachelet
